Education: Bachelors in Computer Science from Tier 1 college
Years of Experience: 2
Prior Experience: 2 years at a MNC
Date of the Offer: August 2020
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE-1
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 17,50,000 INR
Signing Bonus: 6,00,000 INR (1st year) and 5,00,000 INR (2nd year)
Stock bonus: 7 RSUs vested over 4 years (5, 15, 40 and 40%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~24,25,000 INR for the 1st year
Benefits: Standard Amazon benefits
Other details: Tried to negotiate, recruiter didn't budge. Had a competing offer from a startup with 24,00,000 INR base(no other components, this was the CTC as well)
